verses.name: Mark 14:35
verses.text: And he went forward a little, and fell on the ground, and prayed that, if it were possible, the hour might pass from him.

verses.name: Mark 14:36
verses.text: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.

verses.name: Mark 14:37
verses.text: And he cometh, and findeth them sleeping, and saith unto Peter, Simon, sleepest thou? couldest not thou watch one hour?

verses.name: Mark 14:38
verses.text: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
